text: Kuch Gunjoan Ki Shaan Mein () is a 2000 book by British author Mahmud Khan, written in Urdu. The title literally means "In Praise of Baldness". It was written to address a perceived absence of humour in books written in Urdu, available in the United Kingdom. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website Category:2000 books Category:Urdu-language literature
title: Kuch Gunjoan Ki Shaan Mein
